scripts.lookForViteyssCount: vyInst=`ps aux | grep node | grep runIt | wc -l`;echo '[ '$vyInst' ] < -- to many? Need to be 0 differnt running somewhere';
scripts.killAllRunningNow: kill `ps aux | grep node | grep runItSelector | awk '{print $2}'`;
scripts.postinstall: echo ' *  running post install';npm run installSharelibs; echo '___ DONE ';exit 0;
scripts.mkBackup: fn=$npm_package_name"_v"$npm_package_version"_tt"`date +%y%m%d%H%M%S`".tar.bz2"; echo "name will be [$fn]";  tar --exclude=".git" --exclude="node_modules" -cvf "../"$fn ./; echo "Backup done: [$fn]"; ls -alh ../$fn
